languages.text: "Сколь быстротечны моменты счастья, шерин. Уходите, но знайте, что за столом Джай Хейдари всегда рады вам".
"How fleeting are moments of happiness, shereen. Go, but know that you are always welcome at Jae Heydari's table."
languages.original_text: "Сколь быстротечны моменты счастья, шерин. Уходите, но знайте, что за столом Джай Хейдари всегда рады вам".

traits.locale_text: "How fleeting are moments of happiness, shereen. Go, but know that you are always welcome at Jae Heydari's table."
"How fleeting are moments of happiness, shereen. Go, but know that you are always welcome at Jae Heydari's table."
"How fleeting are moments of happiness, shereen. Go, but know that you are always welcome at Jae Heydari's table."
"How fleeting are moments of happiness, shereen. Go, but know that you are always welcome at Jae Heydari's table."

languages.text: “幸福的时光总是如此短暂，亲爱的。走吧，不过别忘了，婕伊·海达利的餐桌永远欢迎你。”
languages.original_text: "How fleeting are moments of happiness, shereen. Go, but know that you are always welcome at Jae Heydari's table."

traits.locale_text: “幸福的时光总是如此短暂，亲爱的。走吧，不过别忘了，婕伊·海达利的餐桌永远欢迎你。”

languages.text: 「幸福の瞬間は、なんとはかないものなんだろうね、シェリーン。でも、ジェイ・ヘイダリのテーブルではいつだって歓迎だよ。忘れないで」
languages.original_text: "How fleeting are moments of happiness, shereen. Go, but know that you are always welcome at Jae Heydari's table."

traits.locale_text: 「幸福の瞬間は、なんとはかないものなんだろうね、シェリーン。でも、ジェイ・ヘイダリのテーブルではいつだって歓迎だよ。忘れないで」

languages.text: «Los momentos de felicidad son efímeros, shereen. Vaya, pues, pero sepa que siempre se le recibirá con gusto a la mesa de Jae Heydari».
languages.original_text: "How fleeting are moments of happiness, shereen. Go, but know that you are always welcome at Jae Heydari's table."

traits.locale_text: «Los momentos de felicidad son efímeros, shereen. Vaya, pues, pero sepa que siempre se le recibirá con gusto a la mesa de Jae Heydari».

languages.text: « Le bonheur est si fugace, shereen. Partez, mais sachez que vous serez toujours {mf|le bienvenu|la bienvenue} à la table de Jae Heydari. »
languages.original_text: "How fleeting are moments of happiness, shereen. Go, but know that you are always welcome at Jae Heydari's table."

traits.locale_text: « Le bonheur est si fugace, shereen. Partez, mais sachez que vous serez toujours {mf|le bienvenu|la bienvenue} à la table de Jae Heydari. »

languages.text: "Wie flüchtig doch die Momente des Glücks sind, Shereen. Geht, aber wisset, dass Ihr am Tisch von Jae Heydari immer willkommen seid."
languages.original_text: "How fleeting are moments of happiness, shereen. Go, but know that you are always welcome at Jae Heydari's table."

traits.locale_text: "Wie flüchtig doch die Momente des Glücks sind, Shereen. Geht, aber wisset, dass Ihr am Tisch von Jae Heydari immer willkommen seid."

languages.text: "Mutlu anlar ne kadar da geçici oluyor şirinim. Git o hâlde ama Jae Heydari'nin masasında her daim hoş karşılanacağını da unutma."
languages.original_text: "How fleeting are moments of happiness, shereen. Go, but know that you are always welcome at Jae Heydari's table."

traits.locale_text: "Mutlu anlar ne kadar da geçici oluyor şirinim. Git o hâlde ama Jae Heydari'nin masasında her daim hoş karşılanacağını da unutma."
